* `parse_ranking`: Given a string that represents a ranking, the function translate
  the string to an object of the class ranking, which is a vector contaning the 
  position of each candidate.

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(consensus)
#library(stringr)
```

Representation of a ranking:

```
a > b ~ c > d > e
b > a ~ c ~ e > d
```
